mapper.delete: DELETE c1 FROM ems_curriculum c1 LEFT JOIN ems_profession p1 ON c1.professionId_n = p1.professionId_n LEFT JOIN ems_faculty f1 ON p1.facultyId_n = f1.facultyId_n WHERE f1.facultyId_n = #{facultyId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT c.curriculumId_n AS curriculumId, c.subjectId_n AS subjectId, c.classId_n AS clazzId, c.professionId_n AS professionId, c.teacherId_n AS teacherId, c.semester_n AS semester, c.create_dt AS createDate, c.create_m AS createBy FROM ems_curriculum c LEFT JOIN ems_profession p ON c.professionId_n = p.professionId_n LEFT JOIN ems_faculty f ON p.facultyId_n = f.facultyId_n WHERE f.facultyId_n = #{facultyId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
